properties.name: app.security.allow-api
properties.description: If true, disable authentication requirement on endpoints.

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.aad.issuer-uri
properties.description: URI to Azure AD issuer, i.e. '${AAD_ISSUER_URI}/v2.0'.

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.aad.jwk-set-uri
properties.description: URI to Azure AD JWK Set, i.e. '${AAD_ISSUER_URI}/v2.0'.

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.resourceserver.aad.accepted-audience
properties.description: Accepted audience for Azure AD, i.e. '${azure.app.client.id}, api://${azure.app.client.id}'.
